name: Muscle Car Stunts
description:
Are you ready for the unbelievable dangerous car tracks Rides? Start your heavy engine and explore massively unique tracks adventure 3D game. Aspiring 3D graphics, realistic vehicle physics, enjoyable environments are waiting for you.

Muscle Car Stunts is a thrilling, amazing, incredible and very entertaining simulation game. Sit on the fastest cars seats and prove the outstanding smooth Car controls. You will extremely see the thrilling, dangerous and the exciting challenging tracks and the risky car riding tricks.

Features:
• Dangerous and impossible tracks
• Outstanding 3D graphics and smooth cars controls
• Realistic engine sounds effect
• Pleasant environment and unbelievable stunt cars
• Different various camera view
• Challenging levels and tricky ramps
• Many powerful and beautiful muscle cars to choose and play
• Amazing tracks perilous sharp turns with jumps and risky obstacles
